Package com.mygdx.pirategame.screens

Class SkillTree

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.pirategame.screens.SkillTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class SkillTree extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
The type for the skill tree screen. It is a visual representation for the skills that the game automatically unlocks for the player. Automatically unlocked when a points threshold is reached
